name: Campbells Prime Meat
tag_list: scotch-beef, fresh-fish, traditional-butcher, haggis, scotch-pork, scotch-lamb
overview: Order fresh meat fish and delicatessen produce from a traditional Scottish butcher, with free delivery to your door on orders over £50. Our produce is fresh, not frozen, and our butchers and fishmongers will prepare your order to your specification if you require. We produce many of our own products, including haggis, made to a family recipe dating back to 1911, using traditional lamb ingredients. Our meat is certified Scotch Beef, Lamb and Pork, traceable to farm and feed, with high animal welfare standards. We have twice weekly deliveries from Rungis Market in Paris. We have a wide range of fish, including smoked salmon, smoked with our own recipe wood chips, and fresh fish from Scottish fishing boats. As well as haggis, we provide many other Scottish delicacies, including Arbroath Smokies, Loch Fyne kippers, Lorne Sausage and our own Black Pudding.
